It feels like a never-ending battle within myself, and sometimes I wonder if I'll ever find a solution that truly works. The daily suicidal ideations are a constant reminder of how fragile my mental health is, and it's hard not to feel like a failure when yet another medication doesn't work out. But I keep pushing on, hoping that one day I'll find the right combination of coping mechanisms to help me through this difficult journey." #depression #mentalhealth #suicideprevention
